Summary: The document announces that ParallelChain Lab and NUS are currently hiring for several positions including Blockchain/Rust Smart Contract Intern, Data Science Intern, Mobile Developer, Blockchain Developer, and Full Stack Developer. All positions are full-time and require on-site employment. Interested candidates can send their CV and transcripts to a specified email address, indicating their position of interest and availability. More details can be found on the ParallelChain Lab website.
